title: What time is RuPaul’s Drag Race UK on tonight?
text:
RuPaul’s Drag Race UK showcases every Thursday (Picture: BBC)

The crème de la crème of the UK’s drag scene will be on our screens again as RuPaul’s Drag Race UK returns for another instalment.

The highly-anticipated series debuted on October 3 to fans’ delight and was quickly hailed as better than the original version across the pond.

Gothy Kendoll became the first queen to be eliminated from RuPaul’s Drag Race UK, with her lack of confidence landing her in the bottom and lip-syncing for her life.

What time is RuPaul’s Drag Race UK?

Fans can catch RuPaul and the gang for another slice of action at 8pm on BBC Three.

Gothy failed to impress the judges (Picture: Leigh Keily/BBC)

If you’re not able to catch it live, the series will also be available on BBC iPlayer.

There are eight episodes in total, with new episodes released weekly at the same time.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Which contestants are still in RuPaul’s Drag Race UK?

With only one elimination so far and eight to go, the title of series champion is still very much to play for.

There are nine contestants still in the running to be crowned the queen – they are:

Baga Chipz, 29, from London

Blue Hydrangea, 23, from Belfast

Cheryl Hole, 25, from Essex

Crystal, 34, from London

Divina de Campo, 35, from West Yorkshire

Scaredy Kat, 20, from Wiltshire

Sum Ting Wong, 30, from Birmingham

Vinegar Strokes, 35, from London

The Vivienne, 27, from Liverpool

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

RuPaul’s Drag Race UK continues on Thursdays at 8pm on BBC Three.

MORE: RuPaul’s Drag Race UK’s first eliminated queen: ‘If Alan Carr thinks estate agents wear Mugler, he has another thing coming’
description: RuPaul's Drag Race UK returns for another explosive episode after it saw the first elimination of the series on October 3.
